resources.string: 1. What is the UI building block of an Android app? Correct answer - A. Activity
2. What is an Intent in Android? Correct answer - A. A message object that is used to communicate between components
3. What is the difference between a Service and a Thread in Android? Correct answer - A. A Service runs in the background, while a Thread runs on the UI thread
4. What is the difference between an Activity and a Fragment in Android? Correct answer - A. An Activity represents a single screen, while a Fragment represents a portion of a screen
5. How can you store data in Android? Correct answer - D. All of the above
6. What is the purpose of the AndroidManifest file? Correct answer - B. To define the apps components and permissions
7. What is the Android SDK? Correct answer - A. A set of tools and resources for building Android apps
8. How can you handle user input in Android? Correct answer - D. All of the above
9. How can you communicate between different components in Android? Correct answer - D. All of the above
10. What is an AsyncTask in Android? Correct answer - A. A mechanism for running tasks in the background
11. What is the Android Support Library? Correct answer - A. A set of libraries for adding new features to older versions of Android
12. What is the Android Gradle plugin? Correct answer - A. A set of tools for building and deploying Android apps
13. What is the Android NDK? Correct answer - A. A set of tools for developing native code for Android
14. What is the Android Emulator? Correct answer - A. A virtual device for running and testing Android apps
15. What is the Android XML layout file? Correct answer - A. A file containing the layout and UI elements of an activity
